**Topic:** [Brief title of your article]

**Cultural Significance:** Explain why this topic is important or interesting within the target culture. Connect it to broader cultural themes.

**Planned Content:**
- Word count target (e.g., 800 words)
- Types of media (e.g., 5 original photos, 1 embedded video, etc.)
- Glossary items (e.g., 5 key vocabulary terms with translations)

**Learning Objectives:** What language skills or cultural knowledge do you hope to develop through this article?
